items.title: Trump's New Tariffs: Top U.S.-Centric Stocks Amid Escalating Trade Tensions
items.description: Explore US retail and service stocks as a hedge against tariffs and currency headwinds. Click for my top U.S. stock picks in a world of escalating trade tensions.

items.title: 11 Dividend Increases Expected In February 2025
items.description: February 2025 will see 11 expected dividend increases from companies with a history of consistent annual dividend hikes. Read more to see a full review.
